lastReason: web_fetch: / returns Streamlit and /_stcore/health=ok; browser snapshot confirms full interactive app (mode selector, rankings, 全市場查詢) and no 『無法取得台股股票池』.
lastFixSummary: Enforced websocket stability flags directly in Render start command (--server.enableWebsocketCompression false --server.websocketPingInterval 30) so runtime cannot ignore .streamlit config during bootstrap.
